text: Yini chilena mrta, tarapara tamke amara jibanta karalama, ara tamra jan'ya tairi karalama alo yara sahayye tini manusadera madhye calaphera karena, -- tini ki tara mato yara tulana hacche emana eka loka ye thake andhakare ya theke tara berunora patha ne'i? E'ibhabe abisbasidera jan'ya amara cittakarsaka kare thaki ya tara karate thake.
